name: createCustomFieldOption
description:
Creates options and, where the custom select field is of the type Select List (cascading), cascading options for a custom select field. The options are added to a context of the field.

The maximum number of options that can be created per request is 1000 and each field can have a maximum of 10000 options.

This operation works for custom field options created in Jira or the operations from this resource. **To work with issue field select list options created for Connect apps use the [Issue custom field options (apps)](#api-group-issue-custom-field-options--apps-) operations.**

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

fieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

BulkCustomFieldOptionCreateRequest.description: Details of the options to create for a custom field.

CustomFieldOptionCreate.description: Details of a custom field option to create.

optionId.description: For cascading options, the ID of the custom field object containing the cascading option.

value.description: The value of the custom field option.

$block: A list of custom field options for a context.
